Bāeo Bare Face

Brand: Baeo

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Beeswax (Cera Alba), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Oil, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Flower Oil, Calendula Officinalis (Cale

la Officinalis (Calendula Flower Extract, Lavendula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity; LOW: Cancer, Use Restrictions
